website_summaries.verdict: An extra large outdoor fridge with a reliable design.
pros: At 5.2 cubic feet, this is one of the larger outdoor fridges available
Though it is more expensive than much of the competition, it maintains a cold temperature well and features a display and thermostat for precise temperature adjustments
cons: The price of this model may put it out of reach for many people looking for a basic outdoor fridge

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is dependable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost 5 years ago. I came back to my order, because I need to vacuum the coils, and lost my manual I found the manual by googling the model number. Bottom line, you have to remove the bottom grill to access the coils, which are easily cleaned with a vacuum and a long thin coil brush. Anyway, I was suprised at the negative reviews. I have been very pleased with my Blaze Outdoor Refrigerator. I have had zero problems with it. It sits on my back porch operating year around. Still keeps our beverages cold!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: This fridge just did not stand up
customer_reviews.text: We put in a outdoor kitchen and thought that this would be the perfect fit for our outside cooling needs, the fridge lasted about a year and stopped cooling items inside. Now we are in need of finding a replacement fridge that will fit the space that was custom build for this item and would never purchase this one again. Not worth the money... our advice find something else for a much lower price point. If it only lasts a year you will have saved the difference in price with this unit to buy a replacement. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH $1k!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible fridge. Not even close to be worth the $1000 we paid. Display lasted about 11 months. Fridge itself completely gone after about 2 years. Used in a completely DRY area, under a covered patio, under a counter in Texas.
customer_reviews.author: War Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy this for outside
customer_reviews.text: Agree with everyone’s comments we purchased it on amazon and it lasted less than 10 months and it stopped cooling. Not worth 1k. Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Parra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a beverage center with the Blaze. Drinks are ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kristofek

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Bought this 5 years ago, Display started to go first about 3 years ago, finally no display at all. Would still cool til last month. In a covered kitchen and not in direct sunlight. Now I have to find one that will fit in the built in stone opening.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 years, going strong
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my outdoor lanai in Florida. The only problem after almost 5 years constant use is, the display is going out. The seller said to contact them for warranty repair, I suspect it will keep working way past the warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Pannett

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Installed less than a month, but cooling drinks and keeping food cold in Georgia heat and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilia

customer_reviews.title: or hiring a carpenter and rebuilding to accommodate a better one. I say spend a little more upfront ...
customer_reviews.text: It put this in a completely covered outdoor kitchen and it is not exposed to any temperature extremes. It was barely used, and just stopped working altogether 18 months after purchase for no apparent reason (there is zero warranty of any kind after 1 year). My outdoor kitchen was built to accommodate this particular unit, so now I am faced with the prospect of buying another one of these which may stop working at any time, or hiring a carpenter and rebuilding to accommodate a better one. I say spend a little more upfront to get one that lasts longer or at least has a better warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to replace.
customer_reviews.text: My Blaze 24” fridge worked “excellent” for 5 years. This season it quit. I can not find anything that can hold as many beverages in comparison at any price range. I’m going to throw caution to the wind and buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Vmajo1

customer_reviews.title: lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Had in an outdoor kitchen fully protected from the elements with plenty of ventilation in the bar. The unit lasted 2 years then died. Wouldn't cool to lower than 60 degrees. The LED temperature lights also stop functioning fully within 1 year. Not happy with the purchase because I built the outdoor kitchen bar with the refrigerator cutout dimensions to match this refrigerator. And the odds of getting a different brand with the same dimensions is low.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this outdoor fridge for almost 2 years. All I've had is problems from this fridge. Right now it won't go below 65 degrees. I understand I live in Texas where it is hot but if you open this fridge to load it with refreshments it immediately freezes up and you have to shut it down and let it defrost and power back up. It has never worked as advertised, very disappointed with the amount I paid and the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, didn’t last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Owned this refrigerator for several years and never worked correctly. Freeze up inside in summer worked ok after though in winter. Called multiple times about it and just got a run around till finally it ran its one year warranty out. Save your thousand dollars and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product December 2015 for a new home. Stopped working properly a few weeks ago and now no longer cools. Warranty is one year - lol. Not a good product and I'm done with Blaze.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: The doors on this fridge are dented and warped... They come that way from the factory. I've had mine for about 6 months now, it no longer cools. Temp read 76 and is set to 43. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Parts no longer available for this model
customer_reviews.text: My unit needs repair and parts are no longer available and the company discontinued this model - DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Epstein

customer_reviews.title: clean, sleek, but noisy
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and set up. Blue vs white interior light, along with broad range of temp setting is nice. Adjustable feet makes easy to level on uneven surface. The 5.2 ft3 is nice to have too...what a difference when compared to the 4.1... Fan noise is louder than expected when operating.
customer_reviews.author: C. L

customer_reviews.title: we bought this in 2014 end of the season. ...
customer_reviews.text: we bought this in 2014 end of the season. for 1K we should not be having problems with the touch sensor not working this early on. it doesn't work 90% of the time and this is only our second season with this fridge. Now we cant adjust the temp! DO NOT spend this kind of money with a 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Factory closed, hard to find replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: My air temperature sensor failed and since the factory has shut down it is hard to find replacement part or find a technician that is familiar with Blaze products to repair it. Probably better to buy more common brand names as it will be easier to find someone who can fix it and find replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: CM

product_meta.title: Blaze Blz-Ssrf-50D Outdoor Rated Stainless 24 In. Refrigerator 5.2 Cu
product_meta.description: The Blaze 5.2 Outdoor Rated Compact Refrigerator is the ideal space saving solution for outdoor kitchens built into your island. Interior design offers plenty of shelf space for all your favorite refreshments and foods. The stylish stainless steel design pairs well with your other outdoor kitchen products. Features. Spacious 5.2 interior allows for storage convenience. 3 adjustable chrome storage shelves provide a variety of arrangement options. Automatic defrost reduces maintenance and freezer burn. Internal fan and digital thermostat for precise temperature management. Interior light makes things easy to find. The reversible door option allows a left or right door swing. UL approved for outdoor useSpecifications. Actual Product Weight - 95 lbs.. Product Overall Dimensions- 33 1/2" H x 23 5/8" W x 23 11/16" D. Cut Out Dimensions - 34 1/2" H x 24 1/2" W x 24 1/2"D
feature_bullets: Automatic defrost reduces maintenance and freezer burn
Internal fan and digital thermostat for precise temperature management
Interior light makes things easy to find
Spacious 5.2 interior allows for storage convenience
3 adjustable chrome storage shelves provide a variety of arrangement options

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.5 out of 5 stars26 ratings2.5 out of 5 stars
